types.html:
djandjou m or f (plural djandjous)

  1. (Ivory Coast slang) woman who lets herself be seduced for material gain
    • 2015, “La vie de Louga”, in Elow’N (lyrics), Cubisme, performed by Kiff No Beat:
      Digba boyard dans mon guelemou
      Arobase pour un bonjour
      50 femmes pour un coucou
      Bad Bitch sur mon kiki!
      Y’a des djandjous dans mon lit
      Hench boyar according to my mouth
      Tag for a hello
      50 women for one cuckoo
      Bad bitch on my wick!
      There are hoes in my bed
trans: woman who lets herself be seduced for material gain
